name: Roll Playing Game (MADWHiZZ, futshi)
description:
Roll Playing Game is a fast paced arcade game where the player takes control of a somewhat ball shaped object.The aim of the game is to get a score as high as possible while moving down a procedurally generated obstacle course, . The game itself is endless unless the ball gets destroyed by an obstacle or dropping down the obstacle course.

RPG also features a local-multiplayer mode where one player takes control of the ball and the other players take control of the obstacles.

Created for Game Development and Design, Graz University of Technology
